data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Zrnovci, North Macedonia so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zrnovci, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Zrnovci, North Macedonia that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 575 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Zrnovci, North Macedonia that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 4 believers in Zrnovci that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Albanian, Macedonian people.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Zrnovci, North Macedonia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Zrnovci, North Macedonia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.section_summary:
the state of Zrnovci, North Macedonia has a population of 2,300.

We estimate Zrnovci has 4 people who might know Jesus, 1,422 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 875 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 575 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 1,422 people in the state of Zrnovci who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.
